scripts.test:up: npx sequelize-cli db:create --env=test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env=test && npx sequelize-cli --env test db:seed:all
scripts.dev:up: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.dev:down: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
